Module com.pizza_group.project4
Package com.pizza_group.project4

Class MainController

java.lang.Object
com.pizza_group.project4.MainController
public class MainController extends Object
MainController creates the main menu, holds methods for navigating to different windows, and methods for managing orders and pizzas.
Author:
Alexis Wilson, James Alba

  • Method Details

    • showCurrentOrders

      protected void showCurrentOrders()
      showCurrentOrders() creates a new stage and sets root to proper fxml file for Current Order window. Catches exceptions if unable to open stage.

    • showStoreOrders

      protected void showStoreOrders()
      showStoresOrders() creates a new stage and sets root to proper fxml file for Store Order window. Catches exception if unable to open window.

    • openNewYorkPizza

      protected void openNewYorkPizza()
      openNewYorkPizza() creates a new stage and sets root to proper fxml file for New York Style Pizza Ordering View window. Catches exception if unable to open window.

    • getTotalOrder

      public Order getTotalOrder()
      Gets Order object for current total order
      Returns:

    • openChicagoPizza

      protected void openChicagoPizza()
      openChicagoPizza() creates a new stage and sets root to proper fxml file for Chicago Style Pizza Ordering View window. Catches exception if unable to open window.

    • getOrderObservableList

      public javafx.collections.ObservableList<Pizza> getOrderObservableList()
      This returns an observable list of total order using the getOrder method.
      Returns:
      An ObservableList of the pizza object.

    • enableAllButtons

      public void enableAllButtons()
      This enables all the buttons in the main view fxml file. This is so that the user is able to use the main menu after its been disabled.

    • disableAllButtons

      public void disableAllButtons()
      This disables all the buttons in the main view fxml file. This is to prevent any possible errors from occurring by the user opening multiple windows of different functions.

    • getOrderNumber

      public int getOrderNumber()
      This is a helper function that returns an order number to be used when called.
      Returns:
      Integer representing a unique order number.

    • addOrderNumber

      public void addOrderNumber()
      This is a helper function that increases the order number in order to maintain uniqueness. This is used when an order is added to the store orders and a new order number is needed.

    • getStoreOrders

      public StoreOrder getStoreOrders()
      This is a helper function that returns the store orders object in this class.
      Returns:
      StoreOrder object representing the store orders.

    • getStoreOrderObservableList

      public javafx.collections.ObservableList<Order> getStoreOrderObservableList()
      This is a helper function that returns the store orders in an observable list form.
      Returns:
      ObservableList of the Order object representing an observable list of the store orders.

    • getPizzaOrdersObservableList

      public javafx.collections.ObservableList<Pizza> getPizzaOrdersObservableList()
      This is a helper function that returns the current order in an observable list form.
      Returns:
      ObservableList of the pizza object representing the list of pizzas that are currently being ordered.
